data.title: The Prometheus Deception
data.meta_description: Nicholas Bryson spent years as a deep cover operative for the American secr et intelligence group, The Directorate. After a disastrous mission, Bryson was retir
data.text: Nicholas Bryson spent years as a deep cover operative for the American secr et intelligence group, The Directorate. After a disastrous mission, Bryson was retired to a new identity. Now, years later, his cover is cracked and B ryson learns that The Directorate was not what it claimed -- that he was, i n fact, a pawn being used against his country's interests. The Directorate is headed for a dangerous endgame, and the CIA recruits Bryson to stop them . But after years on the sidelines, Bryson's field skills are rusty, his co ntacts unreliable, his instincts suspect, and he no longer knows who - if a nyone - can be trusted.
